1.title: ¿What is your excuse to travel?
1.plot: Three very different people show up in Puebla, Mexico, to join Manu on his journey.

2.title: What the Party Has Joined Let No Road Separate
2.plot: The group wakes up in the middle of nowhere, they have no idea how they got there or what to do next.

-1.title: Pilot
-1.plot: Manu got fired from his desk job and decided to travel around Mexico. He is looking for the places in some old pictures his dad took before he died. The trip changed his life and now he invites strangers to travel with him. This is how the reality show Excapes is born.

imdb.plot outline: Manu is 28 years old, he just got fired for his job and, in this very moment, he is traveling around Mexico. ¿What drove him to travel? He found some pictures of his dad's travels, who died before Manu was born, and decided he wanted to see the places his dad visited. After the first trip, Manu got so excited that he is now inviting anyone who would join him to travel. He doesn't care what your name is, where you are from, how much money you got, or what's your profession, the only thing that matters is that you want to travel.
imdb.title: Excapes.tv
plot: Manu is traveling around México searching for the places his dad visited before he died. However, he loves traveling so much he is inviting anyone who wants to join him.::Bernardo De Urquidi

Manu is 28 years old, he just got fired for his job and, in this very moment, he is traveling around Mexico. ¿What drove him to travel? He found some pictures of his dad's travels, who died before Manu was born, and decided he wanted to see the places his dad visited. After the first trip, Manu got so excited that he is now inviting anyone who would join him to travel. He doesn't care what your name is, where you are from, how much money you got, or what's your profession, the only thing that matters is that you want to travel.::Bernardo De Urquidi
